name: blue-karaoke
description: Sistema de Karaokê Blue Karaoke - Reprodução de músicas para karaokê
author: Blue Karaoke <contato@bluekaraokes.com.br>

scripts.electron:dev: concurrently "cross-env NODE_ENV=development next dev --webpack" "wait-on http://localhost:3000 && cross-env NODE_ENV=development electron ."
scripts.electron:start: concurrently "cross-env NODE_ENV=development next dev --webpack" "wait-on http://localhost:3000 && cross-env NODE_ENV=development electron ."
scripts.electron:build:win: next build --webpack && npm run electron:prepare-standalone && npx electron-rebuild -f -w better-sqlite3 && npm run electron:copy-sqlite && electron-builder --win --config electron-builder.config.js
scripts.electron:build:win:publish: next build --webpack && npm run electron:prepare-standalone && npx electron-rebuild -f -w better-sqlite3 && npm run electron:copy-sqlite && electron-builder --win --x64 --ia32 --config electron-builder.config.js --publish always
scripts.electron:build:win:ci: next build --webpack && npm run electron:prepare-standalone && npx electron-rebuild -f -w better-sqlite3 && npm run electron:copy-sqlite && electron-builder --win --x64 --ia32 --config electron-builder.config.js
scripts.electron:prepare-standalone: npx shx cp -r .next/static .next/standalone/.next/ && npx shx cp -r public .next/standalone/
scripts.electron:copy-sqlite: npx shx rm -rf .next/standalone/node_modules/better-sqlite3 && npx shx cp -r node_modules/better-sqlite3 .next/standalone/node_modules/
scripts.electron:build:linux:publish: next build --webpack && npm run electron:prepare-standalone && npx electron-rebuild -f -w better-sqlite3 && npm run electron:copy-sqlite && electron-builder --linux --config electron-builder.config.js --publish always
scripts.electron:build:linux:ci: next build --webpack && npm run electron:prepare-standalone && npx electron-rebuild -f -w better-sqlite3 && npm run electron:copy-sqlite && electron-builder --linux --config electron-builder.config.js
scripts.postinstall: echo 'Skipping electron rebuild. Run bun run electron:rebuild when needed for production build.'
